newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Computer Science started.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Computer Science started.

text.p: -- Lehman Brothers analyst Patrick Burton confirmed he initiated coverage of Computer Sciences Corp with a buy rating and a one-year price target of $85 to $90 per share.

-- "The market for information technology is expected to grow at a rate of 20 percent a year, with government information technology spending to increase by five percent this year," Burton said in a research note.
-- He said the company was well positioned in the right vertical markets, which it said were financial services, healthcare and the government.

-- He said that the company was growing faster than either Electronic Data Systems Corp or International Business Machines Corp services, with growth fueled by commercial outsourcing contracts and a consistent earnings growth rate over the past three years.
